content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
I got the a spicy Korean stew, which was extremely spicy for me, even though I can manage my heat fairly well.The side dishes were amazing and tasted so fresh, I was so happy.Service was fast and it is a nice, hip, and clean restaurant
